review_text: This was my second stay here and it was perfect.
This was perfect for my work trip. it was close to where I needed to be and in a quiet neighborhood.
Nice newer home. Easy stay. Needs more bath towels but wasn't a big deal.

Naomi was very responsive. The issues I had were:
- The house is really a 3 bedroom home, and the master bed/bath locked off. No real issues there, but just not clear in description
- The house is very bare. The room I stayed in had JUST A BED. Nothing else other than an old mirror on the floor, a few hangers in the closet. I had to bring a dining room chair to the room to act as a night stand. I complained to Naomi, and she said she gives pictures that show this, but it wasn't clear to me that the house was bare and felt very temporary.
- Backyard totally torn up. No outdoor seating, and just a very uncomfortable loveseat in the main room.
- The INTERNET DOWN entire time. I understand that's not the owners fault, but given the house was so uncomfortable, we had no tv, no place to sit outside, the only thing to do was sleep :(
I try to give constructive reviews, people need to understand what they are buying here and i think there is opportunity for simple owner improvement
Worked perfectly for us and much better than staying in a hotel.
Great host perfect stay. Thank you

My family and I really enjoyed staying here, the house was super clean. The location was prefect, great neighborhood. We felt right at home and comfortable. We will definitely stay here if we're in the area again. I had a few questions before I rented and she responded quickly. This is one of the best places I've stayed at so far. she's a great host!
Me and my family really enjoyed staying here. It really felt like home, its beautiful and had everything we needed.
Very good place and thanks.
Greatful to have a house to stay in for a week instead of a hotel.
Naomi was great to work with
it was just what my daughter needed
Naomi was very hospitable. It was a meeting place to pick up my mom and it was clean, comfortable, the neighborhood was great. It made the whole process very easy. Thank you Naomi

Great location ! Beautiful and clean home. Only thing I have to say is the bedroom to left, the bed is very uncomfortable. Also blanket was very thin. There was no extra blankets for us to use. All the closet doors where you would assume blankets would be were locked. Everything else was great! Would stay there again!
Naomi's house was a great place to stay! Good location, spacious, clean and tidy, very comfortable. Great value. Naomi was helpful and responsive. We would definitely stay here again.
Nice quaint place to stay before heading to BRC. Naomi was very responsive and everything went smoothly
Naomi was a great communicator
Host was great , house was beautiful and clean . Great place to stay at
Very comfortable and clean.

I couldn’t imagine a better place to stay in Fernley then Naomi‘s lovely bungalow! Terrific value, wonderfully warm host, and a very comfortable environment! If you’re wandering through northern Nevada and wondering if you should book this place for the night, the answer is absolutely yes!
Naomi’s place was amazing -great location, new house, clean, quiet and comfortable. We had the entire home to ourselves. I highly recommend, and would definitely stay here again!

I can not say enough great things about Naomi. She hosted us at her beautiful home for over a week. She has a beautiful home, and by far the cleanest one me and my family have stayed at in Nevada. She was very nice, great communication, and responsive. Her place felt just like home. We will most definitely keep booking her home. I highly recommend. The house is very clean the garage space is amazing and omg I LOVE her kitchen. Very spacious! Thank you Naomi for hosting me and my family!
Naomi was on point and very responsive. Would definitely contacther for another visit next time we come through Fernley!

I stayed while visiting my brother in the Fallon assisted living community. I got much-needed peace & comfort in a beautiful safe place. (I was fine being alone in the house, but I do recommend a lock on the bedroom door. I also recommend a bedside table, and a chest of drawers.) Naomi is a great communicator but amenities are a bit scarce. (She would have helped me if I messaged her, & that is critical and assuring.) There's a Keurig, a few tea pods, & bag of coffee. Couldn't decide about stuff in fridge, so I bought things & left hoping there's a use.) A worker got a wine opener for the house. I got toilet tissue (couldn't find any after the first roll), Kleenex, bottle of spray cleaner, laundry detergent & softener, new Kitchen sponges, paper towels (like I use at home). I appreciated the cool filtered water and excellent Wi-Fi, along with the offer to park in the garage! All in all, folks, this is a 5-star place. I hope Naomi gets lots of guests to enjoy it!

I definitely feel like this airbnb was home away from home. Naomi is such a gracious host and very kind to us. She was so comfortable to be around and gave us our space even though this is her home. My Son, girlfriend and baby were able to spend all the time with me they wanted while I was there. Her home is so comfortable and she makes you feel like it is your own. It was very spacious, clean, comfortable and cool. It was so hot in Fernley so it was nice to have a cool place to spend time with family. The kitchen is well stocked with all you need and a coffee maker that makes great coffee. I would highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to go to Fernley or just passing by. Way better than a motel. Since my son lives there, I will be staying at Naomi's every-time I am there to see my kids. Thank you Naomi for such an awesome place to relax and enjoy family. It is well worth the money. Can't say enough good things about it.
Carrie was very friendly and gave clear instructions. The place was comfortable and quiet. We had a great stay

The unit itself was cozy, comfortable, and had everything you would need for a nights stay. Easy, fuss free check in process. I do have to minus 2 stars because of the dogs. It is noted in the air bnb description that there is a dog on the property however note there are 4-5 dogs on this property, which are behind a gate, and bark a lot. I have no issue with friendly dogs and was happy to see them when I first pulled up to the property. However, only 2 of the dogs are friendly seeming and 2 of them seem very aggressive and will snarl and try to bite through the gate as you walk by. The one small dog was particularly aggressive and barked nonstop for the first 3 hours after my arrival. It was a bit unsettling as the small dog was very bothered by my presence and I was nervous it would squeeze through the gap at the side of the gate and attack me as I was unloading my car. The barking began again in the morning at 6am and continued nonstop until I left two hours later.
It was a cool little spot to stay nice and clean the chairs were nice and the bed was super comfy! Definitely fairly priced.

Darling little place. Very clean and well lit. Easy to find and parking is right out front.
It’s close to my kids and I plan to come back. Carrie responded very quickly and was very helpful and kind. Thanks for a wonderful visit.
This place is exactly as advertised. It is a good place to stay and Carrie was very responsive.
Nice comfortable place .
very friendly dogs, especially the white dog he is a gentle giant. my stay was peaceful . the host is very friendly and responsive.
Nice and quiet place to stay. Would recommend it for any nurse like myself looking for a great place to stay doing a locum tenum assignment. The owner has been attentive and kind also.
I had a great stay here! They were very hospitable, kind, and the space was awesome! Super comfy with plenty of space! House was clean and had everything I needed. Thank you so much!

Carrie’s place was lovely and had exactly what we needed for the night. The place really made you feel at home and had amazing views in the morning. Carrie was very responsive and friendly. She made us feel welcome.

It was comfortable,clean and fit our needs. It was easy to find. It was very quiet except for a short time of dogs barking upon arrival and in the morning. It didn’t hinder our sleep. The coffee was good. The surrounding area is dry desert but it’s not too far from Virginia City. The neighborhood view is mostly mobile homes and a few looked in need of repair. Overall it was worth being close to where we needed to visit. Carrie was very responsive.
Great place in a beautiful location with an outstanding host!
love, this place Carrie is wonderful.

Cute, quaint, cozy, clean, quiet and dog friendly.
We were visiting family nearby and this is the solitary listing that is dog friendly and not a room in a shared home.
Bedroom, bathroom and living room with a microwave, fridge and coffee maker.
Perfect for our purpose and would stay again.
Peaceful location!
Very clean and very nice place. Stayed for a work project and it was very convenient
The room was perfect for us & very clean, private & conveniently close to family. Carrie answered any questions very quickly! We will be back!
wonderful place!! always to be my first option! my pup loves it and so does my husband. Carrie is an amazing host. Very responsive and supportive always available to help.

I will definitely return. very welcoming and friendly. All instructions were clear and understandable. Carrie was very friendly and attentive. It's a great little private get away you can have your fur baby along with. Thank you again Carrie!
It was a perfect place for a quiet get-away for me and my dog.
Nice and quiet
It was great! Quiet; and decorated cute. I was very comfortable. If you find yourself needing to be in stagecoach this place is perfect

Carrie’s place was nice and offered a good place to come rest while I visited Lake Tahoe and Carson City. A little bit of a drive for both but one of the better prices when visiting this area in the summer. Quiet neighborhood, good outdoor views, and confortable overall.
cute little place for 2, very quiet, peaceful, I'll definitely get this place again.
Great stay! Adorable space. Loved the colors/decor. Carrie was super helpful and responsive with replacing a light bulb. Would definitely return for another stay.
Very nice airbnb, it had a living space, a nice bathroom and a spacious bedroom, would stay again!

Carrie is kind and courteous:) The rooms clean and comfy:) The view was awesome:) If in area would definitely book again.
THANKS CARRIE
The apartment was clean quite and comfortable:) And the price is affordable. Carrie is a super nice host and I would gladly stay here anytime.
Very polite and professional. Would go back anytime
Was as it was described

My husband and our toddler stayed at Carrie’s place for 3 nights to attend our friends wedding. I was super excited that I found a place so close to the wedding and for such a great price! Carrie was very responsive and made check in and check out super easy. She was accommodating to our needs to make our stay as smooth as possible. Very private, quiet and beautiful location. Inside was clean and had all the basic amenities we needed. Carrie was a great host and we’re very satisfied with our stay!
As always love the quiet and comfortable accommodations. Carrie is great host and very thoughtful.
This was a great little space! Just enough room for one or two, easy to find, and so comfortable. Communication with or from Carrie was good. I loved all the unique style the place had.
The space was very clean and spacious. The stay was very peaceful. I would stay again. The host Carrie was very helpful and responded quickly to my questions.
Quiet but bed is not the most comfortable
Carrie was an excellent host and a great communicator! She made me feel welcome and she fully attended to any issues I had during my stay. Definitely deserving of the Super Host title.
Very good experience. It’s better than expected. Easy to find and the room is very clean. Better to update your introduction picture shown in Ab&b, more people will be attracted for sure.
Definitely off the beaten path. Plan to visit civilization every other day for food. There's no real storage or cooking capabilities, but that was a welcomed time off.
Nice clean space
A great, clean little place in a convenient location. Would definitely recommend!
Great Airbnb! Highly recommend.

This is a quiet and spacious place to stay right off US 50. Carrie is a responsive host and respectful of privacy. The porch is a lovely place to view the sunrise/sunsets on the nearby hills and Sierras in the distance.
Great place!
Carrie is such a great host! She really thought of everything to make for a comfortable stay. The place is well decorated and super comfy.

Very enjoyable and quiet desert stay. Peaceful location. Carrie is a great host. Very comfortable. Nicely decorated, clean and well stocked. Wifi is great. So much nicer than a hotel room and very reasonably priced. Would definitely stay again if we find ourselves passing thru Stagecoach.

Great place! Just as described. Pluses for me: quiet place and not busy like a hotel or motel; soft sheets and comfy bed; coffee maker and coffee; fridge and microwave; and deck for stargazing 🔭 Most of pet friendly and communication were greatly appreciated.
Carrie is an excellent host! Wonderful communication, very helpful! The space is cute and cozy! Location is very peaceful. I enjoyed my stay very much and hope to be back again!
A very nicely appointed room with private entrance, comfortable bed, and respite from the road.

Carrie's Tumbleweed Inn was my first Airbnb and I could not be more pleased with the cozy and very private unit she provided. It was the perfect desert escape from the city. I was also very pleased on how clean and comfortable I felt. I not only felt safe, but very welcomed by Carrie who was very helpful and kind.
Very nice and clean room with amenities as listed. Quiet and peaceful. Walking available in the hills behind the property. Carrie is very helpful answering questions.

I stayed here long term, everything worked out great, even without a kitchen. The place is clean and well decorated. The location is nice in a rural setting, nice views of the surrounding mountains and wild horses roaming the neighborhood.
This place is perfect! Clean with very comfy bed !!!
Everything is spot on making this an excellent place to stay!
The place is exactly as listed, the hosts are responsive, and it's a great value. Would recommend!
Beautifully decor and cozy. Host is awesome. Highly recommend
Carries place was great for us. It was comfy and she had everything you need, and some. She was available for anything else we needed. I highly recommend if you need a place in this area.
Needed a spot between Reno & Fallon and this was perfect. Cheerful, comfy, super clean. Fridge, microwave, & coffee supplies were just right for my short stay.
Spacious, warm, cozy and clean. Would definitely stay here again.
Very cozy place, Carrie is very communicative and kind!

It has all the amenities you need. Paper plates, cups, wine glasses, forks, and spoons were provided, which was very helpful. Also, it is located in a very quiet and very scenic area. I highly recommend this Airbnb and will surely be back.
The was a cozy, clean place with and more rom than a motel. Nice place to stay while traveling though Nevada. The Host was always available when needed.
This is my favorite place to stay nice quiet. And a very comfortable bed it has very well thought out floor plan.
Nice clean place in fun small town.
great quiet place to unwind! very cozy, only wish I could of stayed longer...
Great place to stay whether your passing thru or for awhile. No TV but didn't have a problem at all. Carrie has provided everything else you could possibly need an will help with anything she can.

This was the perfect overnight stop for recharging on a long road trip. Carrie has made everything very cozy and clean and easy to access. The high desert location is wonderfully quiet and I enjoyed sitting on the deck with my companion dog in the warm sun. Beautiful touches, very welcoming, and just what an Airbnb should be. Highly recommended!
A cozy, very clean and comfortable place in Stagecoach. I’m working on a project in Stagecoach and the location and affordability of this accommodation is superb for us.
Carrie's place was exactly what we needed after a long drive. The bed was comfortable and was in a quiet area. We would stay again.
Very quiet place. And very comfortable bed!! Always enjoy my time at Carrie’s place!!

They place was very clean, cute and cozy. She even let us stay late as my girlfriend had a headache and didn’t sleep much. She offered us some headache medicine and there was everything else we needed readily available :D

I had to cancel our reservation the day before due to a flight getting delayed and Carrie was so helpful and refunded us in full after getting another booking. I have no doubt this is a perfect place to hang your hat on a trip. Highly recommend.
This is place is huge well thought out and very comfortable bed. For the price it is well worth the stay!! Carrie is very thoughtful!!
Darling small apartment perfect for two or three. Comfortable bed. Easy to get around. We would definitely and will stay here again

Clean, comfortable, near the highway, in a quiet neighborhood with some gorgeous views and safe streets to walk our dog, and so easy to checkin/checkout. We made reservations just a day before our trip and Carrie had everything turnkey. Way better than a motel.

I have throughly enjoyed my stay at Carrie’s place. It is very quiet and bed is comfortable. Lots room to spread out and relax. Listening and watching the quail in the morning is an awesome experience on the patio!!

This place was wonderful - Carrie utilized the space so well to make it feel comfortable, spacious, and homely. The AC unit worked great and the bed was super comfortable. Carrie was a great host and messaged me after we arrived to see if we needed anything, but we didn’t because she provided everything we could’ve needed and then some. It was decorated adorably and it was clear that Carrie cares about guests and providing a positive experience.

wonderful cozy spot. great communication. the space has everything one might need. only stayed one night. booked day of and Carrie was able to accommodate. overall great experience. if you get in late the food options in town whittle down to pretty much nothing - so stock up ahead of time

Everything was wonderful! Stayed just 1 night on my way to colorado and it was very comfortable. Check in was easy, the place had EVERYTHING I needed, including snack bars and waters in the fridge which was a nice bonus! Host was super accommodating of accepting my late reservation and getting everything ready last minute which I really appreciated! definitely recommend.
Great clean place! Thanks

This is nice quiet well thought out little big space!! Have nice sitting area with table and mini fridge!! It’s wonderful to watch the quail cross through the yard!! Carrie has put lots of thought into everything that is inside and out!! Will stay again!!

The apartment was very clean and in a quiet neighborhood. The area has great views of the surrounding desert and mountains. I also loved the attention to detail with the decoration and well-stocked amenities. I felt very safe and comfortable here. Host Carrie met me when I arrived and was very nice, provided information for dining, and was attentive to my needs. I highly recommend staying here if you are visiting the area.
Really pleseantly surprised with how nice this place was! Perfect place to rest our heads.

Tasteful decor w/lots of creativity. Especially loved the wood decor & handmade-style touches. Very inspiring! Super comfy & spacious for our uber short stay.
We had a little problem (my fault: misplaced the key), & Carrie was kind & very responsive. You'll be in good hands!
The area is still growing & it was fun talking to some of the locals @ the nearby market. Be sure to drive slowly on the road: look out for adorable quail crossing!
Nice quiet little big feeling place. Very comfortable bed!! She has thought of everything even the clothes pins to close curtains!! Will be staying again.

Our trip was canceled day of due to law enforcement blocking the roads due to wild fires an hour before we were to arrive at Carrie’s place. Carrie had the option to offer us a full refund, but she kept half of our money, and we had to reroute and find another place to stay that weekend.
Spotless and cute. Carrie was great. We’ll definitely stay here again

This was the perfect place for us to crash at while traveling. Had just the essentials but that’s all we were looking for! Easy check in and check out, nothing more you could really ask for while on the road :)

We needed a place to stay on a road trip and this location was a good place to break up the drive. We didn't know anything about Stagecoach, NV. It seems like a subdivision of mostly mobile homes, some better than others. Carrie's place was a nice home on the highest part of the highest street. The view would have been nice but for the neighbors across the street (lots of various vehicles.) It was very quiet, the sheets and bed were very comfortable. Perfect for the few hours we spent there.
We loved the Tumbleweed Inn! Great stepping stone for a road trip across Nevada. Stars were brilliant at night.

This Airbnb was so cozy, I was tempted to stay an extra night bc of its charm and comfort. Let’s talk about pillows! Thanks Carrie for having not only so many but so FLUFFY. I must of dreamt of cotton candy and marshmallows all night but how would I know? I slept so well it just felt like I blinked and then BOOM it’s the am and I’m as refreshed as a pampered poodle coming from the puppy spa.
After checkout, I went to Pyramid Lake from Carries Guidebook and it was breathtaking. Thanks again for hosting my stay and also for having wonderful recommendations!
5 stars, hands down.
Cheers!
Becca.
Cute, clean, and comfortable. Exactly as described. Would recommend to others without hesitation. Thanks Carrie!

We were not sure what to expect because Stagecoach is a bit out of the way, but we were pleasantly surprised. The place was neat and clean and well stock with just what we needed for our one night stop over. Made for a good night sleep. Carrie communicated clearly with us and was very welcoming.
Great space to stay at. Only stayed for 9 hours total but I'd definitely come back if I need a place to stay in the area
Loved this place. Nice and quiet. Really enjoy sitting on the deck in the morning and watching the quail play.
This place is perfect! Full of thoughtful touches! Highly recommend.

Our stay here was absolutely perfect. Not only is the price amazing for the space (which is beautiful and clean) it’s perfectly located by Lake Tahoe and Reno with the best views. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

The place was as described, pretty simple accommodations. It met our needs and we were grateful for a place to rest where our dogs would be allowed, too. The smell of cleaning solution was a little overwhelming for me initially, but I did adjust to it after awhile.
awesome place to stay, nice cozy unit, easy to find, plentiful parking on the property
The Tumbleweed Inn was a wonderful place to stay! The furniture was very comfy, and Carrie was very welcoming. A nice, private place to stay.

Very well setup place, comfortable bed and the sofa chairs. All basic necessities available, including coffee machine, microwave and a small fridge.
Loved the stay and enjoyed the Nevada sunsets..
Great stay! Carrie thought of everything that travellers need & more! There were a lot of things that we packed that were provided for guests. A really cute, cozy, & quiet place!
Lovely place. Super cute and very quiet and peaceful. Tastefully decorated and the space was more than I expected. Just great!!!! Highly recommend.

The best and probably only place in Stagecoach, Nevada! It provided us a great place to unwind at the end of long days in the field. Although small it provides everything you need to relax and enjoy. The place is kept meticulously clean. The neighborhood was very quite allowing a great night rest.
Extremely cute space and very comfortable! Carrie was very friendly and very communicative. Highly recommend!

Carrie's place was very cute and welcoming! I was traveling through by bicycle and she even had a bicycle pump ready for me and drove me to grab dinner. She is very attentive and her place is clean and offers a lot of privacy/your own entrance.

This is a wonderful little place to stay! It is very clean, cozy, and functional, is well furnished and has everything you need to decompress after a long day in the desert, at Lake Tahoe, or on the road. Carrie was very nice, it’s in a quiet neighborhood, and it’s dog friendly, too!

Carrie's place is proof that downscale and modest doesn't have to mean dumpy or boring. She's transformed what's basically a section of a doublewide into a cute, craft-filled little home away from home in the high Nevada desert. It's a little ways from away from anything that could be considered a tourist attraction (Virginia City, the closest, is a good 25-minute drive), but after two days in Las Vegas, that was just fine with me.
Such a cute little place! Cozy and Comfy
Nice private apartment perfect for a short stay.

Carrie is a gem hidden out there in Stagecoach! She was extremely communicative and kind throughout my stay, and even installed a window unit in the apartment as I was concerned that it would be in the 80’s one of the days I was there and I have an old dog who overheats easily. The place was beautifully decorated and she had many thoughtful touches throughout. I loved the big, cozy blue chair in the living room. Initially, I was a little concerned that it would be too “close quarters” to her because it’s an apartment attached to her house, but it didn’t end up being an issue. My dog used the side of the front yard to potty, and there is also a dirt road just down the street from her (about a quarter of a mile down the street on the right) where I was able to take my dog to run each day. When you arrive, don’t be alarmed by the house before her that has a little shack in the back - that’s not where you’re staying! I almost had a heart attack initially, but her house is the (much nicer!) next one down on the right. Hahaha! Have a wonderful trip!
Great place!
A very nice place to stay! Close to Lake Tahoe and offroading trails :) would stay again.

Wow, This place waas awesome. Wonderful views, Great hospitality, and extremely comfortable bed.
My dogs loved the adventure.

I escaped the city life and this was the perfect place to spend a nice, quiet week. Very cozy space in a quiet part of town. Love the view of the mountains. The people in the neighborhood are friend. Very communicable to places like Reno, Lake Tahoe, Carson City. There is only a microwave and mini fridge, but the Smith's grocery store has great food in the deli for dinner and lunches. I had never been to this part of Nevada and was pleasantly surprised by the atmosphere. Easy check in and out and Carrie checked in on me to see how I was doing.

Carrie's place was the perfect stop between a couple days of long driving. Check-in was smooth, the space was clean, and there were a number of nice extra touches (snacks, water, sanitizer/wipes, coffee, etc). Carrie was also very lax and flexible when we had to change our check-in time due to some delays on our drive. Overall, a great place. Wish we could've stayed longer!
This place was absolutely wonderful. So clean, and cozy. I slept like a rock and felt so safe there. Would definitely book again. Thanks for everything!

Carrie’s place is at a great location, close to different areas to do plenty of activities. Our stay was comfortable and super clean, and Carrie made sure to provide wipes, hand sanitizer and other things necessary while staying at the Airbnb. Also, great coffee!
Expect a friendly but not intrusive host and a warm inviting atmosphere.
Carrie's place was absolutely lovely. It was clean and comfortable, very home-like. We would definitely stay again!
Carrie’s Airbnb is cute, cozy and welcoming. She is quick to communicate and very hospitable. If I could leave more stars, I would. You’re going to love your stay here!!
Leslee goes up and beyond to make sure her guests are well taken care of. Beautiful home.
Good
Great stay in a place with multiple rooms to stay.
Leslee was very helpful, friendly and her place was so clean. Highly reccomended.
A diamond in the rough. Really nicely put together, fantasitc western theme and real deal hostess. If you want a taste of the west try this place.

Leslee was great - the place is amazing and has lots of good features. The WiFi didn’t work - I could have probably called Leslee to see if she could fix it but it was after 10pm and I sent a message on the app hoping it would be taken care of by morning. It wasn’t addressed. I don’t know if that was a fluke or not - BUT the security light right outside the window was so bright I had to put a pillow over my head to sleep. It was like daylight the whole night. And the curtains were sheer and the blinds were a very thin white
Lovely person and cozy place. Such a great and oasis!

What a wonderful stay!!!
Leslee is incredibly friendly, accommodating, and her place is just… wow. So clean, so comfortable, such a beautiful property! All of her critters were very friendly and a wonderful addition. Can’t wait to stay again.
I enjoy staying at the Bar Fly Ranch. It was quite clean and very relaxing. I would come again!
Very comfortable and clean, cozy room and bed, beautiful property. We had a late check in and Leslee was very accommodating and communicative. Welcoming to our dog too. We would stay here again!

Leslee's place exceeded our expectations, it was clean, sparkling clean. The room is really comfortable and smells great. And she's really friendly, easygoing and accommodating. We stayed for a week and had enjoyed her company and grew fond of her dog, which is chill and friendly. We brought our dog along for the trip, was welcomed to play in her backyard. We appreciate that a lot especially seeing how she keeps the backyard in perfect manicure.
She welcomed our use of her kitchen and rest of the property as if it were our own home! Highly recommend to anyone needing a place to stay in the Reno / Fernley area.
The location is okay, far from Walmart.The host is warm and inviting.
Awesome stay! Totally recommend it if you’re in the area!

I had a great time staying at Leslee's place. Easily the best Airbnb experience I've had. She is a great host and a great person. Her place is spotless and very comfortable. Just like being home. I hope to come back the next time I'm in the area.
I would definitely stay again, if in the area.
Comfy space! Recently remodeled and thoughtfully decorated. Convenient location that’s still peaceful and quiet. Enjoyed a brief stay on short notice, Leslee was very responsive and accommodating.

Lesslee was a joy to be around. She made it a point to make me feel at home. The house was very comfortable and exceptionally clean. I highly recommend staying at Lesslee’s . She is a wonderful host!!
Enjoyed my time there, would definitely stay there again in the future. Thank you for the hospitality.

Such a comfortable home with great ranch personality in Fernley. Leslee was a great host, ready to help as needed. The location was good, close to shopping and restaurants. The room was good with a comfortable bed.
The ultimate in modern conveniences set in a comfortable western motif. The house was immaculate and cozy. We were impressed with the quiet neighborhood and easy highway access!

The house and property is well kept and clean.
Our host Leslee, was very thoughtful, accommodating and the kindest person who we now consider a friend of ours.
My Wife and I were in Fernley for work and lucky to find this great little ranch style home with a spacious back yard area and beautiful patio.

Great location, very quiet neighborhood. House is very clean and comfortable, the shower is amazing, the bed is quite comfortable. I was there in the winter and the house was always a perfect temperature, not too hot, and never cold - an impressive feat considering one of the mornings it was 17 degrees when I headed out for my day.
Leslee is a lovely wonderful host, easy going and comfortable to be around, communication was easy and timely. Her house vibe is very comfortable and the decor is spot on cool. I would certainly stay here again.

Leslee is such a warm, accommodating host. She offered to help with bags as well as a hydrating drink upon arrival after a long day of driving. She truly welcomed me into her home for the night, and her place was a great stopover during my move up to Washington.

This was just a great stay. The host was very helpful, friendly and a great communicator. Her home is well decorated, and super-clean. I liked her casualness and she was quick to respond if I had a question. Good location. Safe neighborhood. Thanks!
The home was beautiful. Leslee was a great host. The house was so clean and comfortable. I would definitely stay again.
Lesless is an amazing host. She is thoughtful and make sure to make you feel like home. Her ranch is a beautiful and peaceful place To sit back and relax
Great place nice and clean. Very nice and friendly host. Beautiful horses , dog and cat. Quite and fresh.
Leslee’s place was very clean and comfortable. She was a great host. Her front/ back yard were fixed up so cute! I would definitely come back and stay again!

Leslees place was very nice , warm and has a country feel. The bed was very comfortable just what I needed as I was traveling through for work. She had left rolls on the counter and a nice note. I highly recommend her place to other guests and look forward to returning.

Leslee’s home was warm, cozy and clean. She was very accommodating. She knew I was getting into Reno and driving to Fernley in a snow shower. She messaged me to let me know if I get stuck or needed help to give her a call. She helped me with directions to local businesses. I would definitely recommend her room to others.

I have stayed here many times and highly recommend Leslee's place to anybody. Leslee is very accommodating and respects her guests privacy, but is also friendly and will often share a drink or meal and hang out with you. Easy checking, very hospitable.

We will definitely book the place again when we plan our next trip around.

Great quiet spot!

Absolutely wonderful place in a beautiful spot. Was greeted by Julie’s dog upon arrival who showed us around and to the river! It was great to chat with Julie before heading out. This is such a unique stay, would definitely recommend if you need a peaceful retreat.

Julie was great, she was very responsive and friendly. She provided us with some cool recommendations near the area. Her place had all the amenities that we needed in order to enjoy our trip.

it was definitely the most interesting place I've ever stayed! Julie was very pleasant. The goats caught me and my dog off guard, but they minded their own business and didn't monkey with anything strapped to my vehicle during my move.

We loved this place so much! The host was so nice, and we enjoyed our visit and swimming at the river to cool off after a long drive. The place was super clean and comfortable, we felt right at home!

If you want a clean quiet place near the river this place is for you!

Julie’s place is a great example of air bnb community and brand.

Great place to stay with goats, a river to walk by. A bit sandy as Nevada countryside gets. Overall a quiet peaceful, clean place to stay.

One of my favorite places to stay. Beautiful setting.

Great, comfy and super easy access from highway

My go to stay for fishing pyramid lake!

Julie’s little getaway was awesome! The bathtub is to die for and the shower too!
Super awesome if you’re just needing a little respite and quiet. It was very nice to not have a TV in the room and she did have wi-fi!

Thanks for sharing this Julie!

was a nice little cozy flat. would recommend bringing most your own ammentities towels soaps an stuff like that. also there is goats around haha they are friendly an sweet and was a bonus to see them there. Julie was a very sweet host an was even nicer to take us on such short notice.
A very nice quiet space to rest and Julie is a friendly and accommodating host.
Julie was a great host and was very responsive. The unit was clean, quiet, and a perfect place to rest for the night.

Julie is a great and responsive host! I would definitely stay there again!
Wonderful quiete getaway very private. Clean and comfortable!

Great stay on the ranch. The house was spacious and had everything I needed for my stay over. It’s also very well located right off the highway with plenty of stores and restaurants within a 10 minute drive. The views around the ranch are stunning.
Adventurous place, all good

I highly recommend this delightful place. We arrived super early and Julie was so accommodating and took us for a dip in the river. What a sweetheart! Really great accommodation, just what we needed after a dusty week at Burning Man

Julie’s ranch house was great and just as described in the listing! She was super friendly when we saw each other and very responsive when I communicated with her through Airbnb chat. Her dog was super sweet and friendly, and I loved all the animals roaming around the property.
All my needs were met during my stay and I will book this spot again next time I’m in the area!
Great little sanctuary outside the city.
Super responsive host, easy access off I-80. Really convenient!

Just a short ride from Reno, this is truly a gem out in the open nature. We lived our stay here! Adorable, spacious room, friendly host, interesting property. We'll stay again!
Comfortable bed

Great place to rest and recover on a road trip. Right off the highway, but very peaceful. Had all that we needed to cool down and get a good nights rest. This place is a gem! It’s fantastic for dogs, too.

Julie was so sweet and helpful. We can't wait to stay with her again soon!
Excellent location and super nice host.
Julie’s room made for a perfect stopover on our road-trip and gave us everything we needed for a good night’s rest and to be able to continue on our way the next day.

Julie’s place was just what we were looking for while on the road. Not too fancy, clean, safe, comfortable, private with parking for our unsecured flatbed trailer load. Check in was a breeze and communication was rapid. Cute place, would definitely stay again on our way back through town.
Both cottages are amazing. Beautiful property

Julie is a great host! Cute place! Comfy bed! Nice jetted tub in room for your relaxing pleasure! If you love the peace and quiet of farm life you’ll enjoy! Several farm animals to say hi to and their special dog Ren that will greet you gently and with love ❤️… our pups loved her. Thank you Julie!
We only stayed for a night whilst road tripping, but place was nice with lots of outside space and a super friendly dog.
Perfect place to stop for the night when traveling via I-80.

Great place to stayed been there twice in the last month and a good location for fishing pyramid lake.

Great value! Right on the Truckee River and close to Pyramid Lake.

This place was a great place to stay at while passing through the area. Julie was very communicative and I appreciated having wifi access.

The perfect spot for us! Wish we had another day to relax and explore. Great hiking near by and a great, quiet (surprisingly so with vicinity to 80!) retreat with a lovely view of the Zephyr and freight trains rumbling across the river! Goats were friendly!♥️🚂🐐🥾

Again, we did enjoy our stay, we really really loved the jacuzzi and the dog was awesome!
Lovely spot, everything I needed for a short stop. Best to arrive in the daylight. The drive can be hard to see at night!

Lovely space filled with rustic nostalgia and a patina of an era bygone.

Simple and comfortable accommodations on a sandy farm along the Truckee River. Easy access right off I-80.
A great little cabin outside of the city. It was very peaceful and had everything we needed!

This was a one-night stopover for us and very much suited our needs. Easy to get to off of I-80, very cozy apartment decorated in an eclectic sort of way, and has the basics you would need. And the king bed was suuuper comfy. Great value!
Great find just outside the city of Reno.

Comfy spot with a nice ranch feel. Julie was a very easy host and communication was fast and helpful. Super convenient on/off from I 80, making it a great stop on our road trip.

Cozy accommodations in a private setting.
This place is great and the goats are super cute! Jacuzzi tub is slow to fill, but soooo worth it! The shower is divine and huge. Bed was very comfortable. Conveniently located as well.
great experience and an awesome property, very kind and communicate and hardworking person.
Great location and Julie is awesome and helpful.
Very peaceful setting. Fun to watch the goats. The cottages are one house that is divided into two roomy cottages. Fernley is just 5 minutes away.
clean and inexpensive. we walked down to the river. very peaceful

We got tired of hotels, and your typical Airbnb. Julie’s farm stay offered a different experience where you can walk to the river, greet the goats in the morning, and take a relaxing bath a night. Julie was spot on with her hospitality making sure we find the location, and that our needs are met.
Really great spot and beautiful accommodations. Plus hard to beat the views outside! We were very comfortable with this stop along our road trip.
A nice place walking distance to the river!
always a great time at the property. put the camping chairs in the river and grilled out!

This place is very cute inside. The place is a little goat and chicken ranch. Then when you get inside the Airbnb it is decorated very modern and comfortable. It has a jacuzzi tub and a huge walk in shower. The kitchen has a huge stainless steel sink. It was spacious with a comfy bed.

The stay at Julie’s is very nice - it doesn’t have a lot of appeal from the road - but you have goats & chickens in the area and the accommodations are very comfortable! We even went to the river and waded in it in the evening.

Julie's airbnb is a great stopping point for people who don't want to stay in Reno and right off the highway. In addition, her lovely dog, chickens, and goats add a real fun element to the place. A lot of the compound is clearly under construction and can seem a little confusing at first, but the room was nicely appointed and a perfect way station for some weary road trippers.
Julie’s place was a perfect spot for us to stop during our travels. The jacuzzi bath was a nice added touch. Wish we could have stayed longer!
Lovely cabin. Great communication, wonderful location and awesome amenities. Definitely recommend

Also - there aren't any spare blankets in the room so you may want to bring extras if you get cold
Clean and spacious. The animals were great, especially the super sweet dog.
Julie is a very sweet person and a great host. we enjoyed our stay on her ranch and her dog Ren is just the sweetest.
Exactly what I needed. I was moving and had to bring my big dog with me. It was great spot, there were chickens, goats and rabbits. the hot tub was wondeful!
Julie's place was very clean, just what we wanted!

This is a nice quiet space ,very comfortable.

Compact, cozy and comfortable for a small family. It’s also perfect if you have a pet. The bed was so comfortable. Julie was such an awesome host and I loved their hospitality! I left some of my stuff in the house and Julie was so helpful and said she will ship them to me. Such a relaxing and comfortable spot. If you're lucky like us, you might even get to meet a goat!

Beautiful place to stay. I stopped through on my way to Vegas and had a great time! Was able to wander the property and met a very playful dog and a goat with a nice home.

This place has a unique charm, and I would definitely recommend it!

This is a perfect get away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Just a place you needed for relaxing. We had fun, especially our little puppy who love to chase and play with the goat and Julie’s puppy. We we’re able to take home fresh eggs straight from her hens. It was a nice experience. We will come back for sure. :)

We’re already planning our next “Get-away” here and looking forward to it.
Thank you Julie😊
Wonderful place to rest with our 15mo baby on a long i80 road trip.
Very cozy and on beautiful land!

The reviews before me were mostly accurate. I didn’t spend much time on the property. This is the perfect spot for pyramid fly fishing trips. This is a very rustic and sparse piece of land. The room is cozy but very minimally equipped. The bed is high but comfortable. There are extra blankets in the closet to keep you warm. It's very clean.

If you want a space right off the highway for a nights rest this is it! Decent bed and the jet bathtub is amazing. Its a nice and quiet single room. The only downside was that there were dirty cups put away and three spiders on the ceiling. But other than that i enjoyed my stay. thanks!
Beautiful Airbnb the jet tub was just what we needed after a long day of traveling.
