Very cool place.

Great value for money, easy access to I-80. Barebones basic amenities (no salt and pepper, no knife, no dish liquid or scrub, bar soap instead of liquid hand soap, no kitchen towels etc). Julie is very friendly and walked us to the river (which is about half a mile away). My daughter got a thrill out of seeing the goats, hens and dog on the property.
Julie's place was a great stopover place for us while traveling. The room was very clean and everything was just as described. Her dog is adorable and very sweet!
Good spot for quick stopover.
Julie made our stay great. Very friendly and welcoming . The place was clean and very spacious. Kids had a blast running around the property with the chickens and the goats . Thank you!

Julie’s place is a great desert getaway. She was an accommodating, friendly and helpful host. The guest house is very spacious, with a nice remodeled bathroom that has good spa-like towels and a great shower. It was fun to stay on this quirky little farm, not to mention she has the cutest puppy in the world! We would be happy to stay here again.
Great place to stop for the night on a long drive with my dog. Peaceful, spacious, and easy to find after dark. Julie was quick to respond, and check-in/out was a breeze. Would stay again!

I had a great stay at Julie's place. It was spacious, tranquil, and impeccably clean. A perfect spot to rest, write, and take in some sun and mountains. Really a beautiful place. Julie was a lovely host. She gave great directions to help me find the space. I hope to make a trip there again. Thanks so much, Julie!

Julie has a great cabin-like studio that is perfect for a writers retreat or a nights respite on a long drive, which was our use. The space is thoughtful, ample, and clean. We also liked parking right in front of the room.

Great place to stay and enjoy the rural northern Nevada atmosphere. Host was very friendly and responsive. Our 3 year old really enjoyed being able to hang out with dog, chickens, and goats on the ranch 👍

Just what we were looking for for a relaxed stay outside of Reno. Enjoyed exploring Pyramid Lake, and it was a mellow drive into Reno for food and errands. The farm is full of character, and the space itself is comfortable, thoughtfully decorated, and very clean. Thanks, Julie!
Great location
Great place to spend the night when traveling with dog.

The cabin is a nice place to stop if you're traveling on Hwy 50 or 80 near Reno and don't want to stay in a motel or go as far a Reno. Julie and her daughter Julie are super sweet. We were very happy that we got to check out late, as we checked in late at night after a long drive from Utah. Julie was very quick to respond and accommodating!
If you're looking for luxury, this is not the place for you. But it is a good place to stop on your way through Nevada if you're interested in interesting people with interesting stories.
We're hoping to come see what Julie has done with the place next year, and in the years to come as we travel on 50 or 80 near her compound.
Nice location off of the highway and the farm had a pleasant feel to it!
Was very comfortable bed and nice large shower.
Nice place, near a small river where you can dip. Beautiful mountains all around. Next time, I'll take a daytrip to Pyramid Lake.
The place was just as described, very convenient.

Thanks for letting us stay at your lovely home Julie!
It was exactly what we needed after a long drive on our way home!
Stay was excellent. Went in with an open mind and didn't expect anything extravagant. Much enjoyed stay and the good morning greeting from the ranch doggo.

Julie’s place is clean and comfortable, and Julie was responsive to my inquiries and concerns. It’s very close to 80, so the freeway noise makes it less peaceful to sit outside. It wasn’t terribly well stocked, especially the kitchenette. The jacuzzi and shower are very nice. There were some friendly teenagers about, and a gentle 3-legged dog named Red, along with a few goats.
Wonderful host and very thoughtful. We had a great stay with 2 small children.
Place was great for our relocation from CA to CO. It was sparkling clean!

Julie was a welcoming home and we found our accommodation functional, sparkling clean and spacious. Good location on our road trip as it’s minutes from I80, next time i would bring ear plugs for a quieter nights sleep. Walk to the river with our dog was nice at the end of a days driving.
This farm property is dusty and a bit desolate, but the unit is modern and pristine.
Great location - rural, quiet and just a few minutes off I-80. The room is comfortable and the shower is great. We were greeted by goats outside in the morning, very charming.
Easy check-in. Rural location with river access. Good value and location for exploring the area!
Nice room to stay at for the evening. We did find it difficult to find room #2 as the room didn’t have a # on it to label it. That is my only complaint. Otherwise it was a good stay!

An interesting property with history and charm. The amenities were great, a very comfortable bed and ample space to park two cars. It was relaxing to walk to the river and around the property after a long day’s drive. And there’s goats!

The place is very cute, sweet, and cozy! We had a couple of cleanliness issues when arriving but Julie came over to fix it up. We did not get to use the Jacuzzi since flakes were coming from the jets each time we tried (Julie even came and cleaned the tub out again once this happened). But the area around is very lovely!
(As a side note, if you are somewhat of an arachnophobe like myself, there were also a decent amount of spiders inside of our room. It is on a farm location though so not too surprising).

Great stay at a farm. I loved feeding the goats, and my cat loved watching them from the window. We did not use the tub, so we can't speak on that, but the shower and bathroom was very nice. We stayed for a week, so it was nice to have a fridge and microwave. I enjoyed going into the river with Julie and her daughter, Julie, one day while my boyfriend worked from home. He did unfortunately struggle with the internet speeds initially, but we believe this was likely due to the location of the farm. Julie was very accommodating and made sure she did everything she could to help us with the internet speeds. Using a WIFI extender that we purchased from Walmart, we were able to get approximately 10-25 mbps. If you would like a farm getaway with animals (chickens, roosters, goats, and their friendly dog), definitely stay here. It was also about 1.5 hours from Lake Tahoe, which we went to three times during our stay.

If you don't judge a book by it's cover, you'll love this site. The room was very clean and comfortable and provided lots of space for us and our dog. It was also a great value and preferable to staying in a hotel in this somewhat remote area.

Rental unit was comfortable and the photos are accurate. As mentioned in other reviews (which I did not read carefully before staying here) the setting is "rustic and utilitarian" with many "working buildings". I was taken aback by the outdoor setting, but happy with the interior. Julie was helpful when we had an issue. Kitchen needs more dishes and silverware, soap and sponge. When we mentioned it, Julie offered to bring more, but we had already eaten. Good for a stay when passing through on I 80.
This was a great stop on our road trip. Julie and her daughter were very friendly as were their animals. This is a very unique property and the views of the stars at night were unmatched

Hmmm, interesting place....if you need things perfect this is not the place for you, however, the quirks are memorable and made for some unusual photos to send to friends. Despite the description, this is not a ranch but a collection of aging buildings, some uninhabitable and festooned with graffiti and goats running through them. The Airbnb unit on the inside however is very acceptable and with 2 changes, overall would be very nice. Recently renovated, the bath and kitchens are new and the floors are pergo hardwood throughout. It was also very clean. But The mattress is saggy and the air conditioner is aggressive / noisy and so sleep was not good. The host is very very nice and she has a GREAT dog. It also is not far from seeing numerous bands of wild horses in the town named Mustang. So if you can do quirky, don’t have a bad back that needs a firm bed and plan just to come in and have a clean place to eat and sleep then it might work for you.

This is a great place to stay while on a cross country trip. Julie's place is very conveniently located and easy to access from I-80. It's small but very clean with good A/C and a lovely shower! We loved seeing the goats and quails, and hearing an owl at night. The walk down to the river was lovely after a long day driving. We would stay here again :)
Julie is amazing! The space she has set up is great, especially for a getaway. I’m considering staying for longer next time, if she ever has the availability! 😀😀😀

Julie’s place was very clean and comfortable. A perfect place to stop and rest during our long journey to Colorado. There was plenty of room for two people and two pups. Our youngest dog had a lot of fun playing with Julie’s sweet dog while we packed up our car. We would definitely stop here again if we are passing through.

Julie and her daughter were very polite and sweet. The inside was very neat and clean. Located next the river with beautiful Scenery also town is about five minutes away with nice restaurants, shopping center and 2 casinos. Will definitely recommend to my friends
A great place to relax and unplug. Enjoyed the Truckee River, the landscape, and being in a rural location. Julie is a great and caring host. It was fun being able to relax and see the area.

We booked Julie's place on our trip across the country with our dog and it was a perfect place to stay just off the interstate. The property was as listed and anything you could need. Julie was a wonderful host and was very friendly and responsive. If there was anything we needed, all we had to do was ask and she'd be at the front door with it! We appreciated the space and the large shower. Private and quiet, we slept like logs.
Julie was a great host! Very friendly and clean was my first impression upon arrival inside. The water is just a short walk down. Was fun to play farm for a day!
This is a great place to stay. Super clean inside and Julie is very friendly.

Julie was an incredible host. The living arrangements and amenities were beyond our expectations. The place was clean and well decorated. The hot tub and spacious, shower was a huge plus for us. We have two dogs and both our pups loved their time exploring the property. The property is well secured and safe. We were very happy with our experience. Julie and her daughter were very accommodating and kind. There’s a beautiful river on the property that is incredibly clean and safe for dog swims. We usually don’t let our dogs play in natural water, but the river was clear and very clean. It was an amazing experience and we highly recommend considering staying here when in the area! You won’t find any better!
Really nice spa room with access to the river
Julie was a total sweetheart. Place was super clean and I really enjoyed my stay. Very peaceful property, the nearby river was a dream and the night sky was breathtaking.

What a great place to stop for a night during our cross country road trip! Our doggos loved running on the farm and meeting the other animals! The place is clean, tiny, and quite chic! Wish we had longer to stay! Julie was a wonderful and communicative host.

The inside of cottage is clean and very basic. Font expect anything other than some toilet paper and a few dishes you can use it needed. Be prepared to walk around tracking dust all around because the parking lot ( whole property) is just loose dirt. Your shoes and vehicles and yourself might leave the place ready for a good shower after. Carefully that the goats roaming around do not try and get onto your vehicles, they are pretty heavy and will damage. Host was nice but maybe that is why this place had much better reviews that made it misguiding. Next time travels through this area will stay at the hotel in fernley.
Great location on the river. We enjoyed swimming and hanging out on the property. The room is good sized and had what we needed. Recommend!

This was a great place and we felt safe. We were so tired at the end of a long drive and were able to book this place for the same evening with minimal research. Julie was super responsive to make that happen. Thank you Julie for letting stay at your eclectic ranch. Our dog met some goats for the first time and that was cool too :).

Very low key, cute little farm stay with the sweetest dog you've ever met! Great for kids, great for pet owners! Accommodations are very simple with minimum amendments, but this was fine for us for just a 1 night stay.
If we are passing through again, we will definitely stop by!

We had a great stay for what we needed. Julie is a great host and welcomed us at the property.
As you arrive, the scenery might question you but DO NOT let it full you. The location is developing and the Airbnb’s are really nice and clean!!! Definitely would stay again!

Just the right spot for a road trip stop! Make sure to use the perfect French press coffee maker. The interior is just as described in the listing and reviews. If exterior beauty is your thing, go to the river, watch the sunset, or look at the star filled sky. Great spot with super hosts. (Other choices in the area seem to be hotels right on the highway)

As expected, located right off of 80 so convenient place to stop on our road trip. The outside is a bit rural - dirt, multiple buildings one with broken windows and tagged with graffiti looking art where the goats live - but the actual place you stay in is clean and remodeled. There was another person staying in an adjacent building that we could hear and were not aware of until check in so may want to double check with Julie before booking if that concerns you. She was friendly and hospitable.

Julie's place was close to the highway and made for a perfect place to stay on our cross country road trip. The bed was great! The goats and the dog were great additions. Loved the shower (surprised on the size of it). Her daughter was very helpful!

Julie's place is nice and clean- similar to the photos. One thing I found disturbing is that there is a grotesque drawing (and quite sexist in the wording) description of how women should remove tampons. For example, it addresses how men should educate women about tampons and says any woman that flushes a tampon is an "idiot". I believe they made this after having issues with guests flushing harmful products into their septic system, but a simple "Feminine hygiene products will back up the septic system. If backups occur, guests will be charged!", or something similar, would have been more appropriate. Overall though, a nice place to stay and a welcoming family. Plus, the goats were fun.

Julie was great and very welcoming for a quick stop on our family road trip. She showed our toddler where to find all the animals and let him sit in the tractor. He had a blast which means we did too.

Nice quaint place, super clean. Nice bed. Short walk or drive down to the water. Goats and chickens on the property lead to a nice peaceful country feel. River access could be cleaner. Some old furniture detracted from the ambience.

Julie's place was exactly as described. We had total privacy and were free to walk about the property. The property looks like it has been around for many years, there are buildings on the premises that are older and not in use, but this did not hinder our stay. It was actually a good place to take some vintage photos. The area is very open and desolate, if you are in need of silence then this is a great place to stay. I will give 5 stars alone to the jetted hot tub, this was my favorite part of my stay. The place is the size of a studio but had everything I needed. Make sure you check the weather prior to your stay since it was very windy when we visited , however, it gave us a "horror movie" kind of feel and we loved it. The property is right next to the highway and you do not need to drive down windy roads. You only need to drive a matter of yards to actually get to the airbnb once you enter the property. There is a Walmart, fastfood, gas stations and a couple casinos w/ restauarants an exit away.
Perfect place to spend the night with my puppy! We enjoyed meeting resident puppy Ren, watching the goats, and playing in the river. Great night sleep too and Julie is very friendly and kind!

There is a really nice bathtub. The renovations are really nice. The bed is a bit uncomfortable. Right off the highway and a perfect place to rest on our road trip. The hosts were really nice and invited us to have a campfire with them. Make sure you aren’t scared of goats if you book here.

The apartment that we stayed in was nice and accurate to the description of the property, however upon arrival the property can be surprising. There is an abandoned house near the apartments that is covered in graffiti that is not shown in property photos. There are many other buildings on the property that were also left out of photos. The land is nice and there is a beautiful river that you are able to walk to. Julie was a kind host and communicated quickly. Had the description and photos been accurate, I would not have booked, however now that I have stayed, I would book again.
Travelers be aware that the apartments do not have a way to lock completely. Could still get in with the code. I personally would have felt safer with another lock on the door.

The space is super comfortable & the location for an i80 traveler, very practical. The farm animals were a joy to play with and Julie is a wonderful conversationalist & hostess. Had a great stay. Highly recommend!

This unit right off the freeway so if you're looking for a private place to stay that is quiet and pet friendly while you're travelling on 80, Julie's place works extremely well for that. Especially during this pandemic, Julie assured us of her disinfecting procedures and we found the unit clean. The bed was comfortable and it has a nice big shower.
Perfect pit stop for a good night’s rest right off the highway!

Julie was an excellent host, the stay was gorgeous and waaaay better than I expected. I loved the marble shower and bath tub (reminded me of a fancy Indian spa). If arriving at night the first thing you'll see when pulling in is the goat house. It can be a little scary if you aren't prepared. No need to worry though, the goats are super friendly and so are the hosts. The place is absolutely stunning in the day and at night the stars are bright.

Julie's place is wonderful. We didn't get a chance to use the jacuzzi tub but next time! We had a great time hanging out by the river, talking with Julie and her daughter, feeding the goats and their puppy Ren. The fire pit was a great way to end the weekend. We'll definitely be back.

The area is rural and quiet but very close to the freeway and Fernley. The internet was great. There’s a small refrigerator with a tiny freezer which was super helpful. The inside of the place was remodeled and had a nice bathroom.

Julie’s place was awesome! Great restful oasis for our family to stop at outside of Reno while traveling along 80.
Secluded, private, quiet area surrounded by nature and a restful respite inside! Taking a soak in the jacuzzi tub (with complementary magnesium oil) was just what I needed after a day on the road.
We were just off 80, so getting back in the road in the morning was almost as easy as turning out of the driveway!

Always a great time at this property. We love having our family farm stays here. The property is beautiful and the location near the river is amazing. We loving being able to hang out on the bikes all day bbq and play with the goats
Perfect for what we needed! Will be back next year most likely!
Coffee brewer would be nice as well../
Great place for the wife and dogs to stay while traveling for work.
Very accommodating since we booked same day as check in. Place was very clean and comfortable. Great quick stay!

Great place
Great host and peaceful neighborhood

This home was absolutely perfect for our holiday trip. The home was clean, well stocked with necessities, and felt like home
it allowed us a safe place to share the holidays with our family and include our dogs. we look forward to booking again.
The mattresses are very firm and comfortable! I had to pull the linens off to order some for my guest bedroom lol
Big house! Very nice, very clean! Just a heads up! Doordash/instacart has a hard time with locating it for some reason. They got sent to the wrong house twice… so let your delivery drivers know.

This place was a home away from home and had lots of space for my family and more. We definitely recommend staying here and if we are in the area again will stay here again. Thanks again for allowing my family to rest at your home.
Excellent home. Had 6 kids w us and needed at least 7-8 beds and this place had that - super comfy mattresses too! TVs in every room. Nothing was hard to do or find. Communication was great. Easy.
The house was very nice and perfect for my family to stay at when they were visiting for the holidays.
Clean property. Easy to find! we stopped on our way through Nevada and it was a nice rest. Thanks!
Great place to stay, my only complaint would be that the beds were really hard and stuff. The whole family Struggled to sleep the first night.
Great place in Fernley! Will definitely stay again!
awesome property
Got to town early and let us check in early, very responsive and great location.
Great place!
Majid’s house is new, clean and worked well for our one night stay. There’s no landscaping or outdoor amenities yet but the house is very comfortable and everything worked as expected.
The house was completely gorgeous and spacious. Very clean and had everything we needed.
Excellent place to stay, incredible house, clean and peaceful. I highly recommend, my family and me were so happy!!

The house was clean with the exception of dog poop in the dirt backyard. If you have a large family and are passing through the area this could work for you.
Otherwise, keep driving. There is nothing to do In Fernely.
The house is large and is furnished with firm beds. Every person gets a bath towel and hand towel, but no face clothes are provided. Also, if you’re staying more than a day and you’re planning on cooking bring everything with you including the salt and pepper.
Also, be sure of your travel plans because the hosts will not honor requests for cancellations.
Finally, when we asked a local what people do in Fernely he summed it up with one word, “leave”.

LOVED LOVED LOVED our stay here! This was one of our favorite Abnbs so far!
The house was SUPER clean, cool, comfortable and perfectly stocked and we also really liked that we could park our car in the huge garage. The neighborhood is so quiet and within a mile of restaurants, Starbucks, grocery and gas - very safe. And the co-hosts were all friendly, super quick to respond and proactive with information.
We will definitely be back!
clean, quiet and comfortable
The stay was great, from easy check-in to the cleanliness and comfortable spaces. It was the perfect size for our stay and we felt very welcome. Would definitely stay here again
We had a great stay!
Still had the new house smell and there was room for all of us. Good communication with the host.

The place was very clean. It was very new and there was a lot of room for my large family. We stayed here for two days to get ready for a funeral and it was a perfect location for us. There isn’t any extra towels or blankets. it was great for what we needed. I mean, it didn’t have knickknacks and things like that, but it was pretty stylish.. I would definitely stay there again. The host was quick to answer any questions so communication was great. If you need an extra towel for like drying your hair, you better bring your own. No bathmats either which I thought was a little odd because you only have one towel per person, so you have no way of drying the floor Unless you use the one that you’ve got around you. Overall I’d stay there again thank you.

Very much enjoyed our at Majid’s listing. Was clean, spacious and comfortable. My only complaint would be if you bring your dogs the back yard is full of large weeds most with stickers and we picked up quite a few nails from when home was built.

We have stayed here multiple times. It's just a place to sleep for the night on our road trip to visit family, but we appreciate the new and clean feeling of the place. We have three kids, and one is little so I love that I don't have to worry about stairs. The house also doesn't have too much clutter for the kids to mess up. The beds are comfortable and I truly appreciate that they don't use too many scented detergents and fabric softeners on the sheets and towels.

The home looks just like the photos. I found it to be a good value and it was quite spacious. Not much to do around the area but it’s a short drive to Reno. The neighborhood is safe. Plenty of televisions and space. The homeowner was responsive and helpful when I reached out.

The house is brand new and exactly as described. We stayed to help family in the area move and we had 10 people, 4 pre teens. Everyone was comfortable. Basic amenities but it says so in the listing. Thanks so much.
Great place to stay

I felt at home, the neighbors were friendly, we made breakfast! The only issue is that in the shared bathrooms there was no towel rack. Nevertheless every bed was beautiful with two towels rolled waiting for us it was such a pleasant stay! So nice to see all those beds made up. I didn't know there was a Keurig machine with coffee pots we didn't even use it but what a sweet gesture. His instructions helped us to connect to the Wi-Fi and then we could screencast on all his TVs hahaha it was great, and it was a tremendous good deal for What he charged us! Thank you, Majid!
This house was a perfect place for my family to stay while we waited for our moving truck to arrive. Thank you for hosting us!
House was clean, there is a ton of room. quiet neighborhood
Very nice clean home. House looks new it is a great spot
Very good!
Very nice place to stay.
Lots of space and has the basics for kitchen. Big driveway to fit a couple vehicles. Wifi was good too.
It was a great new house, clean and the owner was very responsive.

The house was spacious and accommodated our family well. We were there for my father’s celebration of life and many family members attended. There were only plates bowls and coffee mug and one set of pots and pans , no glassware or salad bowls no salt and pepper- you basically have to buy or bring those things. The outside is surrounded by dirt, no outside chairs or places to gather- it is a new rental, I understand- however upgrades need to happen

My family of 5 prefer to stay here on our way to my parents place. We like this house because it's very clean. It helps that it's brand new. It's also safe, neighborhood wise and because I don't have to worry about stairs with my two year old.
The place was exactly what I saw in the pictures. The owner was very responsive and his directions were clear and concise. The house was very nice, clean and spacious. Our party of 10 fit perfectly.

We thoroughly enjoyed our five-night stay at this beautiful new house. The only drawback for us was that the kitchen was poorly equipped for cooking and serving full meals. Nonetheless, we’ll be happy to stay there again when we visit Fernley.
I would definitely look into booking this home again on our next visit to nevada
We appreciate staying here on our way through NV. It's very clean and spacious for our family.

As advertised, brand new home in a quiet development. Easy access to home and freeway. Worked out very well for us and Majid had very good communication and was very responsive to the few requests we had.
It was not the quickest response as it took days to receive one, and my question wasn't answered in the end. Other than that, the house is spacious and squiky clean.

It's really a nice place. We rented it because of the bed space, and we were not disappointed. Large open area (kit, dining, and living room). My siblings and I were in town for a funeral, we had 10, then I think another 6 family members before and after the service, so it was really nice to be able to spread out a little and visit. Very clean!!
There isn't a door for the master bathroom, so maybe a privacy curtain for the shower and tub?? the toilet does however have a door. There aren't any towel rods but I'm not an owner that has to repair loose or damage rods and walls. There is however a washer and dryer. Items easy to work with or around.
Okay so there is the great and the something to consider, overall, I would stay there again without even looking to see what else was available. Thank you for a great stay.
I rented this home for a couple of coworkers. Very responsive. Easy Check-in. Nice neighborhood. They stated it was very homey and nice. Will definitely book this home again.
Clean house with plenty of beds as described.
It was a nice place. Minimum but clear communication and overall a great stay.

New place, pet friendly, clean and lots of room for a family, or two. Minimalistic with just the right amount of amenities to be comfortable. Excellent internet speeds which was top priority for us and why we chose this place to stop for a night while on a road trip. Great communication from owner who accommodated us and some of our special requests at the last minute which we really appreciated. Efficient self check in process. There’s lots of places to eat, a Walmart, a Ralph’s and other such stores an easy 10 min drive from the house.
All the beds are SUPER firm and some bedding could use an update; (they were clean, just looked faded and were thinning out from lots of laundering so they felt a bit lightweight) but if a firm mattress and lightweight bedding is your thing you’ll get a great nights sleep. I myself prefer plush bedding and a soft, pillowy mattress.
wonderful house.. great communication with the host.

Though we only stayed one night we loved this house. It's brand new, you can smell it, but not in a bad way. Super clean!
We loved that it was one story for the kids, so no need to have a baby gate.
They had some basics like soaps and shampoo. I appreciate that they don't use strong scented products in the house. I'm fairly sensitive to them. We enjoyed having the TV entertainment and internet too.
There was lots of space and places for everyone in a family of 5 to sleep.
This place is in a subdivision. Closest place we found for a fishing trip for my husband and his fishing buddies. Had everything we needed but we were Not there much.
The house was very clean, spacious, well equipped and comfortable. Majid was helpful and communicative!
this was our very first Air BnB experience and we may have been spoiled! this house is AMAZING, and we will be back 100% everytime we visit Fernley. thank you for letting us use your home
great brand new home. very comfortable stay. lots of beds to pick your firmness. tvs in every room. highly recommend
Will definitely be back to this house. It was so gorgeous. Definitely my dream home. Would definitely recommend this house to everyone.
All is good
Very professional experience. Would stay again
Great house to stay in!
It was clean and did the job for a one night stay.

The home was nicely decorated, clean and has an open floor plan. Plenty of kitchen items, washing machine and dryer and has a shower that’s easy to get in and out of for people that struggle stepping into a bath tub. We typically sleep on a soft bed so the hard beds were an adjustment but everyone has different opinions on mattresses. Thanks for sharing your home with us. Jeri
served our purpose perfectly. easy check in clean house. we felt at home. relaxing and comfortable.
It was a nice place to stay in.
We had a great stay here! Felt very safe and welcomed. Thanks!

This place was perfect for our fishing trip to Pyramid Lake! It was very clean, the beds were very comfortable, and there were lots of great appliances and utensils in the kitchen, especially the air fryer!! We will recommend this place to our fishing friends and stay here again! Thanks Juan!
Always a comfortable stay at Juan’s!
This house was in a good area, easy to find, clean and cozy. Our family will definitely return in the future.
Great stay! Beautiful clean home & great amount of space ❤️ Host also quick to respond.

Great place to stay. Clean and easy to access. We needed a place to stay while we fished Pyramid Lake and visited the visitor center for the Pyramid reservation. Found that this location was close and access to the desired location was easy.

Juan is very responsive. We found his home to fit our needs especially since we needed ADA requirements. The main suite bathroom included a walk-in shower with a corner bench and grab bars. It is our 2nd stay & we'd happily stay again!
Clean and comfortable as always, thank you Juan.
Always a pleasure staying at Juan’s place!
Very clean and comfortable, very enjoyable stay.

Juan’s house was absolutely everything we were looking for during our long stay. He was a fabulous host that was very responsive. It was nice to stay in a home that had a lot of pride in it. We would recommend and stay again.
Needed a place to stay before closing on our house and Juan's was just what was needed!
Lovely place .. I would definitely stay here again
The house was very clean and conveniently located. Only recommendation is to add additional kitchen appliances.

I would stay again but would be better prepared for no frills. No hangers, no wash cloths, one kitchen towel, no laundry supplies, limited trash receptacles, and the internet was only available to one device. it was clean, updated, and fully ADA equipped.
